synopsis: At 3:00 AM today, the center of Tropical Depression "VERBENA" was estimated based on all available data in the vicinity of Talisay, Cebu (10.3°N, 123.8°E) with maximum sustained winds of 55 km/h near the center and gustiness of up to 90 km/h. It is moving Northwestward at 25 km/h. Shear Line affecting the eastern section of Luzon. Northeast Monsoon affecting the rest of Northern Luzon.
